document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">reckon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">count </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">First </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Poets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">List </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">done </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">looking </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">back </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">First </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">seems </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Comprehend </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whole </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Others </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">look </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">needless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Show </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">write </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Poets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">All </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">lasts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">solid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Year </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">afford </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Sun </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">East </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">deem </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">extravagant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Further </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Beautiful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">prepare </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">worship </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">difficult </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Grace </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">justify </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">Dream </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I reckon when I count at all
